hero.title: Hi, I'm Vladyslav
hero.subtitle: QA Engineer
hero.description: Passionate about ensuring software quality through comprehensive testing, automation frameworks, and continuous improvement processes

phero.description: Specializing in software testing, web and API testing with automation expertise. Passionate about ensuring quality through comprehensive testing strategies.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a dedicated QA Engineer with experience in software testing, specializing in web and API testing. I'm proficient in test automation frameworks and developing automated UI tests, with a solid understanding of SDLC and QA processes.
about.p2: Highly responsible, goal-oriented, and communicative, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality results. I'm dedicated to continuous professional growth and enhancing technical expertise to drive efficiency and innovation in quality assurance.

qa-engineer-1.title: QA Engineer
qa-engineer-1.description: Leading quality assurance initiatives for web and mobile applications, focusing on test automation and process improvement.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained automated test suites using Selenium and C# for web applications
Performed comprehensive API testing using Postman and Python
Collaborated with development teams to implement testing best practices
Created and executed test plans, test cases, and test scripts
Identified, documented, and tracked bugs using JIRA
Conducted regression, functional, and integration testing
achievements: Reduced testing time by 40% through automation framework implementation
Improved bug detection rate by 30% through systematic test coverage analysis
Mentored 3 junior QA engineers in test automation techniques

qa-engineer-2.title: Junior QA Engineer
qa-engineer-2.description: Responsible for manual and automated testing of enterprise software applications.
responsibilities: Executed manual test cases for web applications
Developed automated UI tests using Selenium WebDriver
Participated in Agile ceremonies and sprint planning
Documented test results and reported defects
achievements: Successfully automated 50+ test cases in the first 6 months
Contributed to 95% test coverage for critical features

edu-1.description: Focused on software engineering, quality assurance methodologies, and software testing principles.
achievements: Completed senior project on automated testing frameworks

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of quality assurance projects demonstrating expertise in test automation, performance testing, and continuous integration.

ecommerce-automation.title: E-commerce Test Automation Suite
ecommerce-automation.description: Comprehensive end-to-end test automation framework for a major e-commerce platform, covering user journeys from product browsing to checkout completion.

api-testing-framework.title: Microservices API Testing Framework
api-testing-framework.description: Robust API testing framework designed for microservices architecture, featuring automated contract testing and performance validation.

mobile-ui-automation.title: Mobile App UI Automation
mobile-ui-automation.description: Cross-platform mobile application testing framework supporting both iOS and Android platforms with comprehensive UI validation.

performance-testing.title: Performance Testing & Optimization
performance-testing.description: Comprehensive performance testing strategy including load, stress, and endurance testing for high-traffic web applications.

cicd-integration.title: CI/CD Pipeline Test Integration
cicd-integration.description: Seamless integration of automated testing into continuous integration and deployment pipelines, ensuring quality gates at every stage.

security-testing.title: Security Vulnerability Assessment
security-testing.description: Comprehensive security testing implementation using industry-standard tools to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
